19/* Written by Simon Josefsson. */
20
21#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
22# include <config.h>
23#endif
24
25#include "getdelim.h"
26#include "getline.h"
27
28ssize_t
29getline (char **lineptr, size_t *n, FILE *stream)
30{
31 return getdelim (lineptr, n, '\n', stream);
32}
